dcterms:creator: Nora Hollenstein
Marius Troendle
Ce Zhang
Nicolas Langer
dcterms:description: The ZuCo 2.0 dataset provides simultaneous EEG and eye-tracking data for 18 participants reading a total of 739 sentences, allowing for the analysis of reading patterns and cognitive load during normal and task-specific reading.
dcterms:title: ZuCo 2.0 dataset
